definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Do you want to get the first barrel of gold before someone else.
sentences.chinese: 是否想走到別人前面，賺到第一手錢呢？

sentences.english: They will follow the progress of the Olympic Park ‘big build’ first-hand.
sentences.chinese: 他們將遵循“大建設奧林匹克公園的第一手資料。

sentences.english: None of them gives a firsthand, inside view of the Essenes.
sentences.chinese: 但他們提供了第一手資料，查看裏面的愛色尼。

sentences.english: It thrills them to annotate their textbooks with first-hand information.
sentences.chinese: 學生們興奮於有第一手資料註解他們的課本。

sentences.english: TVXQ the first quick news to be able to present in here.
sentences.chinese: 神起第一手快訊會在這裏呈現。

sentences.english: They gave the only first-hand accounts of what took place that day.
sentences.chinese: 他們的供述提供了當天發生事件唯一的第一手資料。

sentences.english: He Zhou Annals provide us first-handed materials in the monographic study of He Zhou county.
sentences.chinese: 《河州志》是對河州進行專題研究的第一手基礎資料。

sentences.english: The journalist as eyewitness also is considered a primary source.
sentences.chinese: 作爲目擊者的記者本人也被認爲是第一手來源。
你可以得到第一手的信息。

sentences.english: What is the actual first source we have that says anything about Cleopatra?
sentences.chinese: 那目前關於克利奧帕特拉的第一手資料是什麼？

sentences.english: Groupies always get first hand information.
sentences.chinese: 追星族總是有偶像的第一手資料。

sentences.english: This show gives viewers firsthand stories from people who were at the scene.
sentences.chinese: 這個節目爲觀衆帶來當事者娓娓道來的第一手故事。

definition: to learn of (an event)/to hear about (sth)
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
